title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the localization key is left blank during the process of adding, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
OB: In the properties file, leaving the key blank while still having a valid value.
EB: The chart title should display the externalized text even if the key is left blank.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Add a localization key while leaving it blank.
